mapper.select: select isnull(mf.rem,'') AS 'remHead', ---表头备注 isnull(mf.ps_no,'') AS 'psNo',---销货单号 isnull(mf.cus_os_no,'') AS 'cusOsNo',----客户订单号 isnull(tf.prd_name,'')AS 'prdName', ----货品名称 ---tf.unit AS 'unit',---------单位 '1' AS 'unit', convert(varchar(40),isnull(tf.qty,0)) AS 'qty',---数量 convert(varchar(40),isnull(tf.up,0))AS 'up',----单价 convert(varchar(40),isnull(tf.amtn_net,0)) AS 'amtnNet',---未税本位币 isnull(tf.os_no,'') AS 'os_no' ,----EB单号 isnull(tf.bat_no,'')AS 'bat_no',-----批号 isnull(tf.rem,'') AS 'remBody', ----表身摘要 isnull(dx.name,'')AS 'indxName'----种类名称 -- , isnull(tfz.bc,'')AS 'bc',---------备次 -- isnull(tfz.mz,'') AS 'mz',-------毛重 -- isnull(tfz.pz,'')AS 'pz'----皮重 from mf_pss mf left join tf_pss tf on mf.ps_no=tf.ps_no left join prdt pd on tf.prd_no= pd.prd_no left join indx dx on pd.idx1=dx.idx_no --left join tf_pss_z tfz on tfz.ps_no=tf.ps_no where mf.ps_id='SA' and tf.ps_id='SA'
SELECT CUS_NO,NAME FROM CUST WHERE OBJ_ID=1----OBJ_ID=1是客户,2代表厂商
